templates.name: How do I get my birthday gift?
templates.content:
Every Gathred member will be sent the birthday gift as long as they have entered their birthday information on their account as well as opted into receiving our marketing emails.


On the first of each month, we send out an automated email to anyone who was signed up before that date (the 1st of the month) with their birthday code inside. If you signed up after that date, you will not be sent an automated email. This is something we're working on fixing, but for now, if you sign up late, please just send an email to hello@gathre.com and we will get you a code! If you did sign up before the 1st and for some reason haven't gotten your code, please reach out so we can help. 

The birthday gift is good for $25 off of an order of $50 or more and cannot be extended outside of the month it was issued.

templates.name: How do I find my Muck Boot size?
templates.content:
Happy to help! You'll need a ruler, pen, and a piece of paper. Please follow these steps:

1. Place the paper on the ground and stand on it with your weight slightly forward to make sure your foot is flat.
2. Draw a line behind your heel and another line in front of your longest toe. It is common to have one foot longer than the other, so use the longer foot to measure.
3. Measure the distance between lines in inches or centimeters.
4. Find your measurement on the Muck Boot size chart to figure out the best. Round up if your size falls in between.

templates.name: How do I set the timer on my Re-Run watch?
templates.content: Press the right button to scroll through the options and go to the timer page. Then press and hold the left button for 3 seconds to enter the Timer Setting. Once there press the left button to advance through the setting sequence and press the right button to change the current value. Then press the left button to start and stop the countdown timer press the right button, this is only possible when the timer is stopped. When the timer expires a single beep alarm will be heard.

templates.name: How do I achieve a smooth finish?
templates.content:
We recommend these tips for the best smooth mani finish!

- If you need to mix your polish, roll it between your hands rather than shaking it, which can cause bubbles.
- Prep your nails with our Nail Polish Remover Pot or our Nail Primer to make sure the nail plates are clean and dry.
-Start with a thin first coat and a thicker second. Thin coats help prevent bubbling!
- Wait 5-10 minutes in between coats for the polish to adhere.
- Seal with Super Glossy Top Coat and reapply it every 2-3 days to keep your mani fresh!

templates.name: What if there is no dry ice?
templates.content: Dry Ice is frozen carbon dioxide. Unlike most solids, it does not melt into a liquid, but instead changes directly into a gas. This process is called sublimation. If there is no dry ice visible in the cooler, feel the product. If the product is cool, place it in the freezer or follow instructions for preparation. If the product is thawed please contact us at 1-800-282-2722.

templates.name: What kind of wallpaper can be used on RV walls?
templates.content: For RV walls, we recommend checking out our Prepasted Removable Smooth Wallpaper. We suggest applying it to a surface that's a solid, light color. Additionally, allow 4 weeks for any freshly painted or primed walls to fully cure. More information about this product can be found here: https://support.spoonflower.com/hc/en-us/articles/206335696-Prepasted-Removable-Smooth-Wallpaper You may also like our Peel and Stick, but we have some concerns about it not adhering well in an environment that may get really hot. More details about it can be found here as well: https://support.spoonflower.com/hc/en-us/articles/206335716-Peel-and-Stick-Removable-Woven-Wallpaper  Lastly, we highly recommend purchasing swatches before you order in quantity. It's the best way to determine if a product will suit your needs. Our Wallpaper swatches are 2' x 1' and you can apply and remove these particular two to test them out.

templates.name: How should I take care of my glasses or sunglasses?
templates.content: Each pair comes with a cleaning cloth to keep the frames clear of particles and a case to store your glasses. Don't leave your glasses in your car, as heat from the car causes the acetate to warp and flex out of alignment. Be sure not to lay them face down on any surfaces or to expose them to rough textures such as sand. Don't use any chemicals on your lenses as they may strip away their coating. You can use light mineral oil on metal frames to give them additional shine.

templates.name: Are your suit jackets fused or canvased?
templates.content: Our suit jackets are half-canvased. The layers of canvas lining extend down beyond the pecs and stop at the first button on the jacket - which makes it a somewhat longer half-canvasing than you'd find with other brands. The machine that lightly stitches these layers into place is ultra sensitive and imitates the handwork traditionally performed by a tailor. The only fusing used is to reinforce sensitive, high stress areas such as where the pockets are attached to the jacket's body.

templates.name: Proper Sleep: What are the side effects of sleep deprivation?
templates.content: The side effects of sleep deprivation include fatigue, inability to concentrate, mood swings, inability to regulate emotion, depression, irritability, loss of mental acuity, and memory problems. Long-term, sleep deprivation can also cause severe health problems such as obesity, heart disease, kidney disease, high blood pressure, and even stroke. If you're experiencing any of these symptoms, consult your doctor.

templates.name: Body Shield Bronze SPF 50: Stains and won't come out/color transfers
templates.content:
We're so sorry to hear of your experience with Body Shield Bronze. This mineral sunscreen works differently from other products that provide a sunless tan. The bronze color is achieved using iron oxides, which are mineral pigments. These mineral pigments sit on top of skin providing temporary color rather than absorbing into the skin. Although the current formulation offers improved transfer resistance from our original formula, it is not transfer-proof. To minimize color transfer, apply in thin layers, waiting 1-2 minutes to dry between layers. Take care when in contact with delicate or light colored fabrics. Wash immediately with warm water and gentle detergent if color has transferred. We hope this helps.  

If you would like to initiate a return, please reach out to our Concierge team at concierge@colorescience.com.

templates.name: The difference between clean greens and the super greens

Both of them come in powder form and are designed to be mixed into water, or the beverage/food of your choice.

templates.name: What does infuse mean?
templates.content: A synonym for infuse is steep, to mingle something dry with something wet with the idea of extracting the flavor of the dry ingredient. It is then mixed with the chocolate to make the soft ganache.

templates.name: How to clean Casely cases?
templates.content: With lighter color front bumpers, discoloration is possible but not common. To clean the case, you will need to remove your phone from the case first. The best way to clean would be to use a disinfectant wipe and gently rub it on the discolored area. It could take some force but it should come off or remove the majority of the discoloration. If that doesn't remove the discoloration, you can try using a small amount of rubbing alcohol on a paper towel, just enough to dampen the cloth, to clean the discolored area. These two solutions should have your case looking good as new! If neither of these suggestions works to clean the case, please let us know, and we are more than happy to help figure out another solution!

templates.name: It says not suitable for carbonated beverages- is this true?
templates.content: Carbonated beverages should be avoided as they can reduce the effectiveness of the sealing. Carbonated beverages can also build pressure inside the bottle and make it dangerous to remove the lid. Beer generally has a lower carbonation level, so this is safe in our growlers, but we don't suggest storing for long periods of time. This will also not maintain the carbonation of the beverage. Highly acidic beverages should be avoided.

templates.name: How is Rhino in sand, snow, and rain?
templates.content:
Rhino is great in sand, snow, and rain, largely thanks to its fat tires. Our tires provide better grip and traction in sand, snow, mud, and water and when coupled with a powerful 750W motor, you can literally go anywhere you want, in whatever weather. 

Each bike is also equipped with high quality IP67 rated components which means they are waterproof and dust-proof. The IP67 tests means the components can be fully submerged in fresh water for half an hour without any damage. So unless you're thinking of taking your Rhino swimming with you, it should be perfectly fine out in the rain and snow for extended rides.

templates.name: What kind of weather can I ride Level.2 in?
templates.content:
Level.2 can and will tolerate biking during most permitting weather conditions. However, it's an electric bike after all, with electrical components needing some added caution. Level.2 is built to the IPX4 water-resistant standard. IPX4 is standard that indicates your bike is resistant to multi-directional water splashes, meaning it's okay to ride or park your Level.2 in rain. Light to moderate raindrops or splashes from a wet road will not harm your ebike, but be wary of harsher weather and rainfall conditions. Level.2 tires are not intended for riding in snow or during snow fall.

The general rule of thumb is, if weather impacts your visibility and has the possibility to affect your bike's functionality, it is likely not a safe riding condition.

templates.name: How do I resolve tunneling issues with my candles?
templates.content: Tunneling can occur if the wick size isn't optimal for your wax and vessel diameter. If the wick is too small it can't efficiently burn off all of the fuel (wax and fragrance) and generate enough heat to form a good melt pool. To resolve this, try increasing your wick in width (wick up in thickness as well if this doesn't resolve the problem). In some cases, the tunneling can occur when a candle wick consumes too much fuel too quickly. So, if the wick is too large, it will consume the wax extremely fast, causing it to generate too much heat and melt right down the middle of your candle. In this case you'll need to wick down in width (wick down in thickness as well if the problem isn't resolved).

templates.name: Can I take Pistol/Rifle 2 if I haven't taken Pistol/Rifle 1?
templates.content:
Students are required to have taken our introductory level courses (or valid equivalent) in order to take our levels 2 and 3. Other than the obvious safety reasons for this, we also recommend taking that first course (even intermediate/advanced shooters) in order to acquire a holistic view of John's teaching style and to assure the basics he'll expect from students in the more advanced courses.

John likes to build a foundation from the primary courses that may exceed the amount of information or expertise offered anywhere else in more advanced courses. However, with your experience, you should feel comfortable in any intermediate level class (P2, R2) but it is crucial to highlight that the main reason for these requirements is safety. Any indication of mishandling or neglecting safety procedures described in the first courses could result in John expelling you from the class if need be. As long as you remain careful, aware, and attentive, there should be no trouble.

templates.name: Is it expensive to maintain an electric car?
templates.content: Electric cars are fundamentally less complex than gasoline cars, which means they should require less service and maintenance over time. With an electric car, you don't need to pay for oil changes, tune-ups, spark plugs, and the service of other mechanical components. In normal use, regular maintenance on an electric cars should cost roughly a third as much as on a gasoline car. On the other hand, some items on EVs may require more frequent attention: expect to replace tires more frequently, and to service suspension components more often. The weight and performance of electric cars works these components harder, increasing their wear and tear.

templates.name: How does the GoSun remain cool to touch while cooking?

templates.name: Self rescue on an inlet
templates.content:
Safety is always first and we're glad to know you're looking to be prepared. Please keep in mind that while the Inlet is very stable it's not designed for open water due to it being a recreational kayak. This means paddling far from shore in rough waters is dangerous. Don't paddle anywhere that you can't swim back to shore from easily, and don't paddle in cold water, especially without protective gear. 

Our float bags are a good companion that help by displacing water that would otherwise fill a compromised kayak. Water is heavy and it's much harder to try to flip a kayak filled with water and the Oru can easily get bent out of shape in that situation. Float bags for a kayak are similar to a PFD for you. However, good paddling conditions for your kayak and practice will keep you safe. We have had customers try self rescue in controlled environments however body dimensions such as height and weight are a key factor.

templates.name: Are lab grown diamonds fake?
templates.content: Lab grown diamonds aren't an imitation of a diamond that mimics the way diamond looks. They are actual diamonds that are produced in a lab. They are very different from simulated stones like CZ and moissanite, which are lab grown minerals that might look similar to diamonds but aren't diamonds.

templates.name: Bedding: How do I put on the duvet cover?
templates.content:
All of our duvet covers come with handy snap ties at the corners and midpoints that perfectly match up to anchor loops on our comforters. Once you secure them the comforter will never shift or move inside the duvet cover.  For the easiest way to put on the duvet cover follow the steps below:

Turn the duvet cover inside out and lay it on the bed with the opening at the top of the bed. Lay your comforter on top. Connect all ties from the duvet cover to the matching loops on the comforter. Start at the bottom and roll the comforter and the connected duvet cover towards the opening of the duvet cover at the top of the bed. Once you've rolled all the way up to the duvet cover opening, reach inside the opening, grab the entire roll, pull it through the opening, and then unroll it. Your duvet cover is now right-side out and the comforter is secure on the inside.

templates.content: I'm afraid not. Counterfeiters have studied authentic True Religion Brand Jeans and are capable of copying the look of most of our labels and tags (although they are much lower quality). Almost all counterfeit jeans sold on eBay and other auction sites are advertised as New With Tags, but this means nothing because the tags often are counterfeit.

templates.name: What are the performance differences between a Grizzly Locker and a Spartan Locker?
templates.content: The smaller Spartan Locker, also known as a lunchbox locker or an insert-type unit, is easier to install because it replaces the spider gears. Since the Spartan Locker is installed in the carrier it relies on said carrier for strength. The Grizzly Locker, sometimes called a mechanical locker or automatic locker, is bigger and significantly stronger. It replaces the entire carrier assembly and has more clamping force, forged internals, and a forged 8620 low-nickel alloy steel case that is much more robust than the OE carrier it replaces.

templates.name: What makes the serum cooling?
templates.content: The serum has a quick-breaking water effect in which drops of water are a part of the serum formulation. A physical reaction occurs when one spreads the serum onto the skin. The gel breaks apart and releases water droplets which cause a cooling sensation and feelings of freshness. As one continues to spread the formula, the water droplets evaporate stealing heat from the skin to even further decrease the skin's temperature. After the serum is applied, the skin is left with a silky-smooth feeling and a delicate, barely-there barrier that locks in moisture.

templates.name: System: Slow Pour/First Access
templates.content:
I apologize that you have encountered this issue. We have had some feedback from other customers that reflected similar circumstances. What we have found is that this issue primarily happens with the first access to your bottle. On your first access it will take several short bursts of the trigger to get the wine to pour. This is because there is very little room in the bottle for the gas to go. After a couple of short bursts, hold the trigger for about 1/2 - 1 second to complete the first pour. After your first pour, you can then pour using a couple of short, (1/2-1 second) presses to obtain your pour. 

However, please note - it does take a bit of time; the system is designed to deliver a 4-5 ounce pour in about 20-25 seconds. You may note that if you use more bursts that wine pours a bit faster, however that generally causes a waste of the gas which you'll observe through a long venting of gas into the air when the bottle is returned to the upright position after pouring. This is just gas that had no place to go in the bottle as it did not replace wine - so it empties into the air. I hope this helps!

Just a couple things to consider; our wallpaper is designed to work its best when installed on a flat surface so as long as your existing wallpaper is still flush with the wall you should be ok. templates.name: Affirmation, Cristal practice of Agate
templates.content:
On a piece of paper, draw a circle and divide it into 8 equal parts. Fill in each section with one of your top 8 values (e.g. family, career, health, etc). Rank your values from 1 to 8, 1 being the most out of balance. Hold your Agate in your hand and say out loud "I balance ______." (Fill in what you labeled as value 1). Repeat 2 more times.
Place your crystal on the related area of the circle. Focus on this area of your life. Ask yourself: How could I bring more balance into this area?
Once you've created more balance in this area, move your Agate to the next area you want to focus on and repeat the previous step.
Continue with this process until you've brought more balance to all 8 of your values.

templates.name: What does the lead warning in my order mean?
templates.content: It's called "Prop 65" which was legislation passed roughly 35 years ago with the intent of informing consumers of the potential dangers associated with chemicals found in all types of consumer goods. While we support the intent of this legislation in its effort to educate consumers, unfortunately, this legislation makes no distinction between chemicals or metals that may be naturally occuring (think lead in almonds or spices) and those that are the result of human interaction (think fertilizer application). As the primary ingredients in both Kion Flex and Kion Bars are derived from plant sources, there are naturally occuring levels of metals. We have not recently changed anything in the formulation, and go to great lengths to source the highest quality, safest ingredients possible in our formulations. All of our products are formulated and manufactured in compliance with FDA regulations in regard to additives, ingredients and levels of metals.

templates.name: Difference between the wrap and clip ponytails
templates.content:
Our wrap ponytail is a more natural way to get great length and volume! You would simply put your natural hair into a ponytail, and then place the bobby pin anchor into the top of the ponytail. Then, you would wrap the single strand of hair around until it Velcro's together! Some people also like to use bobby pins to make it more secure.

Our clip ponytail is the better option for higher ponies. You would put your natural hair into a ponytail, and then tie it again with the hair tie attached to the clip. Afterwards, you will use the claw clip to clip the ponytail on your natural hair.

templates.name: AireBrush Duo - How do I create more volume?
templates.content: To achieve more volume at the root, begin at the root of your hair with the tool below your section of hair. With the section of hair taut, gently glide the tool up and away, above the crown of your head. Repeat until the roots have dried, sealing the style in with a burst of cool air.

templates.name: Why do you use FD&C dyes?
templates.content: Only some of our products use FD&C (or Food, Drugs, and Cosmetics) dyes, which have been tested and certified by the FDA for usage in those three delivery systems. When formulating, we always start with a base of 100% natural dyes and supplement only as needed with FD&C dyes. Unfortunately, natural dyes alone cannot achieve the bright and vibrant shades Clover is known for. Based on current research, we do not believe that utilizing FD&C dyes in miniscule amounts as a supplement to natural dyes poses a health risk.

templates.name: What is the difference between radial and bias ply tires?
templates.content: The main difference is that Radial tires' steel belts allow the sidewall and the tread to function as individual features, meaning the sidewall can flex without affecting the footprint. Because the plies in bias-ply tires run from sidewall to sidewall, the sidewall is very stiff, and any flexing of the sidewall is reflected in the tires' footprint. Bias-ply tires can also overheat more easily due to the layers of rubber plies, whereas the steel belts in radial tires help to dissipate heat better.

templates.name: Should I schedule my pet's meals or use gravity mode with Feeder-Robot?
templates.content: Deciding how to use the Feeder-Robot depends on your pet's eating habits. If your pet has a habit of overeating or eating very quickly, you may wish to schedule their meals. By scheduling the feeding time, your pet will be eating a measured meal portion, 1 to 8 times per day. If your pet has no issue with overeating and tends to "graze" throughout the day, you may wish to use gravity mode. In gravity mode, the Feeder-Robot bowl remains full based on a check every 6 hours.

templates.name: What is KP?
templates.content: Keratosis pilaris, or KP, is a skin condition caused by the overproduction of keratin which produces rough and bumpy skin - you might know it as "strawberry skin" or "chicken skin." KP Body Scrub buffs away keratin buildup to reduce bumps, flaky skin, redness, and irritation for soft, smooth, and healthy skin.

templates.name: Products too expensive - brand specific
templates.content:
We understand that our product is more expensive than some of the other brands in the freezer aisle. McConnell's is far more expensive to produce than any other ice cream we know of. This is a function of the quality and cost of ingredients and our commitment to doing things our way and to controlling the process, every step of the way. We use better quality ingredients across the board, and we use more of those ingredients, from vanilla to chocolate, etc. Add to this the fact that our product has virtually no air in it (it's called overrun) - less than 10%, versus our closest competitors, whose products contain 40%+ air. But here's the thing: our customers end up getting what they pay for and to us, that's what really matters.

Unfortunately, we also do not set the price in grocery stores. Our retailers are in control of that, and while we do work with them to manage pricing, if their desire is to set a certain margin on our products, we simply cannot control that. McConnell's is a truly made from scratch product - the only one in the freezer aisle that we're aware of. This is significant because it makes for the finest product in the business. And while it may cost a bit more, we think it's worth it. And we hope you ultimately feel the same way.

templates.name: What's the difference between milled and handmade soap?
templates.content:
The primary difference between our milled and handmade soaps is how they're produced! Our handmade soaps are made in-house by our team. They are cold processed and require over 30 days to cure. These are made with softer oils (avocado, coconut, castor, etc.) and tend to have a stronger fragrance as a result. These are the cool, swirly-colored soaps you'll see in our ads.

On the other hand, our milled soaps are machine-made using a milling machine and are free of color. They're comprised of harder oils and a glycerin base, so they're longer-lasting than our handmade, but they do tend to be a bit less fragrant.

There's actually a blog post on this that goes into a little more depth; if you're interested, you can find it here: https://liveoutlaw.com/blogs/no-stinkin-outlaws/whats-the-difference-between-milled-soap-and-handmade-soap?_pos=5&_sid=092479a65&_ss=r

templates.name: How do you keep smoothies fresh for so long?
templates.content: To keep your smoothies fresh without adding preservatives, we use a process called HPP (high pressure processing), also commonly referred to as "cold pressed". This process uses pressure to inactivate the microorganisms that cause fresh food to spoil. Because there is no heat involved, it's a much gentler way to prevent spoilage and one that retains the nutrients and flavors while ensuring food safety.

templates.name: Are Mosh protein bars keto-friendly or low in net carbs?
templates.content: Yes, our protein bars are keto-friendly, low in net carbs and include zero added sugar -- Net Carb Calculation: 18g Total Carbs - 4g Fiber - 2g Vegetable Glycerine - 9g Allulose = 2g Net Carbs. When calculating net carbs, allulose is subtracted from total carbohydrates because it is not metabolized and therefore causes no increase in blood glucose or blood insulin levels (International Food Information Council).

templates.name: Are there any side effects of using IPL?
templates.content: Some people will experience slight discomfort (e.g. heat or redness of the skin) when using the device - this is normal. You may feel heat and tingling when activating the flash, followed by redness in the skin. This type of reaction usually disappears within 24 hours. Adverse reactions are usually immediate or appear within 24 hours. In rare cases, they may take up to 72 hours to appear. If you experience abnormal skin reactions please contact your physician.

templates.name: Butyrate: Insulin resistance, Diabetes, blood sugar regulation
templates.content: Butyrate is a powerful byproduct of a balanced microbiome. It's critically important for digestive and metabolic health. It feeds the cells in our gut and creates a favorable environment for other good bacteria to grow. More than 5,000 research studies have shown that butyrate plays several important roles in the body - major fuel source for the cells lining the large intestine, helping maintain the gut lining, it helps improve immunity by defending against permeability and it stimulates GLP-1, a hormone produced by the gut which helps maintain a healthy balance between insulin and glucose levels. It also helps manage certain symptoms of Type 2 diabetes.

templates.name: How did you decide on the mix to water ratio for your products?
templates.content: We suggest starting with a ratio of 1 cup of mix to 1 cup of water, which is a simple way to measure and usually leads to a delicious result. But since some folks prefer thinner or thicker flapjacks, and since the mix sometimes settles more densely, the 1-to-1 ratio of mix to water is simply a guide. Feel free to experiment by adding more water or more mix depending on your ideal consistency.

templates.name: How does Thermella work?
templates.content: Thermella works by targeting the signals in your body that cause hot flashes and night sweats to rebalance the body's thermoregulatory center. As estrogen declines, the body loses its temperature balance as the signal that warms the body goes into overdrive, causing a hot flash. Thermella works by blocking this signal to restore balance for cooling relief.

templates.name: Is your fish wild-caught or farm-raised?
templates.content: Most of our fish is wild-caught, although the Atlantic salmon, rainbow trout, and catfish are farmed species. If you're someone who is a totally wild-caught fish eater, you may want to try our Wild Ocean Blend or CTS Endurance Pack, any of the Paleo listings, or order the coho salmon, sablefish, and other wild-caught species that we feature. I know you might have heard conflicting things about farm-raised fish, and hopefully we can offer some insight on this. There are 5 of us on the management team and we've spent our careers in seafood. All of us "grew up" in the wild-caught seafood trade, and as time has gone on we have all developed working knowledge in aquaculture as well. The truth is that farm-raised fish varies widely depending on species and practices, and most importantly, whether wild or farmed, you'll find that "good fish is good and bad fish is bad." This is to say that the best-quality fish nowadays tastes great and is raised or caught and handled properly, and the poorest fish is usually what you would expect it to be: poorly handled, often has water-added, and is usually the cheapest stuff you can buy. If you're concerned about environmental responsibility, then it's worth considering where we as humans are in terms of sourcing food globally. We now farm nearly all the plants and land animals that we consume. With a population of 7 billion, we literally would starve without global plant and animal farming. One population article in National Geographic recently noted that if humans were to turn to hunting for animal protein, we would consume all the wild land animals on Earth within a few weeks. Consider that fact for a moment - almost all the land-based food we eat is raised rather than wild-harvested - because it makes environmental sense. Nowadays we farm about half the seafood consumed globally. Aquaculture was developed in part to avoid "fishing to the last fish" - a healthy, tasty way to help supply seafood and take pressure off over-fished resources, and we can attest that the top natural foods grocers today are sourcing farmed fish from suppliers who use no antibiotics, no farm chemicals or pesticides and are in fact environmentally-friendly. Production standards have been developed and are being continuously refined to insure that the environmental and social effect of farming fish is a net positive. So if you shop at the top-end/natural retailers or seek out top fish purveyors, you'll find the best-handled fish available whether it's wild or farmed. If you shop for seafood in big-box discount chains, you'll get what you pay for. As fish guys, we're seeing the differences between these 2 groups getting wider, too, as time goes on. Our mission is to offer direct delivery of top quality seafood. We offer this both to health & fitness-seekers, so that they get the benefits of omega 3 fats in the form of healthy, pure, delicious fish servings, and also to folks who just love great seafood!

templates.name: Can I use both the lotion and serum at the same time?
templates.content: Currently, we don't recommend layering the formulas. We do our very best research and testing to develop targeted solutions for your specific needs. We developed the lotion and serum each for very specific symptoms experienced across a few vaginal conditions, like vulvar and vaginal atrophy, vulvodynia (painful sex), and genitoury syndrome of menopause. We recommend selecting and committing to the lotion or the serum, and committing to a consistent regimen for best results. Over time, as your symptoms of levels of dryness and discomfort may fluctuate, you can switch between the 2.

templates.name: Do you have a weight limit?
templates.content: Our sofa is very durable and has passed all ANSI/BIFMA X5.4-2012 Lounge and Public Seating Tests, which tests whether the piece can withstand 10 years of regular use by a person that is 275 lbs. We currently don't have an official weight limit but we're confident that our Essential Sofa can handle 3-4 people. We test our sofas more for long term use and they all go through BIFMA 5.4 tests that include putting 240 lbs per seat (aka each person). So for our sofa and sectional we've tested it to withstand at least 720 lbs! It isn't a weight limit test but our seating has passed for durability. We also offer our Repair Don't Replace Initiative where you can purchase replacement components for cushions, covers and legs that allow you to freshen up your seating if you ever need to with normal wear.

templates.name: Is Thermella approved by the FDA (Food and Drug Administration)?

This approach gives customers and healthcare providers peace of mind knowing that our claims are supported by rigorous evidence. templates.name: Why did your name change?
templates.content:
We started as a dream in a small LA apartment. That dream was to bring eco-friendly and innovative wooden wicks to makers all around the world. We have evolved into a much different business than we were founded as. 

Today, we offer thousands of different products to makers of all types and our dream to revolutionize industry has grown far beyond just wicks.

And as we continue to dream, grow and build together we decided on a new name that encompasses all we've become and all we will continue to become!

templates.name: Using propane on the PI, how long does it take to reach the right temperature?
templates.content: There are two different temperatures to know - stone temp and ambient air temp. You may see some variability in these numbers as you use Pi: Wood Burning stone temp is 750Â°F, and ambient air is 850Â°F. Gas Burner stone is 800Â°F and ambient air is 900Â°F. The wood-burning setup will vary depending on wood type, the time it takes to get hot, the quantity of fuel added, and the frequency of adding the wood. Outside ambient conditions can also affect stone and air temperatures inside the oven.

templates.content: You should keep them in a wooden or glass bowl or box. They should still be cleansed and charged regularly at least once every two months as they collect the energy from the space around them.

templates.name: My dog is digging at the grass!
templates.content: For playful pups, the grass is a new novelty that gets their curiosity going, which sometimes results in digging and chewing. We suggest that you supervise your dog when using the DoggieLawn to continually reinforce positive behavior and immediately put a stop to any undesired behavior like digging, chewing and snoozing! After a little while, your dog will get the hint and stop digging. We also recommend aviary netting and zip ties as another option to get your dog to stop chewing or digging up the grass until they get trained on how to use it. Simply wrap the grass with the netting and use zip ties to secure it in place. After a couple times of trying unsuccessfully to get at the grass, they should lose interest and stop playing with it.

templates.name: How does vinyl feel on the gun/will it work with traction grip?
templates.content:
Our skins are made from a high-performance, matte finish, vinyl adhesive. To the touch, the surface will feel comparable to a composite stock and it will not be an issue when handling your firearm, however, when installed over a textured grip, the surface will lose some of the traction that you might have been used to. 

To combat this loss in grip, we have developed a product called grip assist. Adding this on top of the vinyl to the touchpoints on your gun can give you the secure holding required to shoot safely and efficiently.

templates.name: Where are your products made / manufactured?
templates.content:
Great question! Like 95% of all e-bikes sold in the US, Rhinos are made from a combination of parts and components from Japan, Korea, Taiwan, and China, and are assembled in China. 

We handle all of the design, testing, and programming in-house in Austin, TX and our team is also responsible for adding the upgrades and finishing touches to each bike before it gets shipped.
 
By assembling our bikes overseas, we're able to save on costs and pass these savings down to you. If we assembled them in the USA, the Rhino would cost up to $500 more, which would unfortunately make them cost prohibitive for lots of people.
 
Every Rhino goes through a rigorous quality control process once it arrives in our Austin warehouse before we send them out to our customers. We want to make sure the bike is absolutely perfect when it arrives on your doorstep.

templates.name: How does stress negatively impact the hair growth cycle?
templates.content:
Stress can cause the hair follicles to shift from a growth state to a rest state. It can also disrupt hormones and nutrient absorption, impacting hair on multiple levels.

We're the only hair supplement that uses Sensoril Ashwagandha to balance elevated cortisol (stress hormone) and help you build resistance to stress.

templates.name: Why am I charged sales tax? I live in a tax-free state

The disconnect forces the system to use a default 10% or manual tax rate application and overcharge. Usually, this reverts to the correct amount when you get to the final stage at check out. If for some reason this does not happen for you, let me know and my team will get it straightened out. Please note that tax is also charged by the 'ship to state' and not the state in which you reside.

Nolah AirFoamICEâ„¢ takes AirFoamâ„¢ to the next level with infused graphite. It offers the same support, durability, and best-in-class pressure relief as our original AirFoamâ„¢, but sleeps even cooler.

templates.name: Do I need to purchase a specific rack/hitch to use with your bikes? / Rack/hitch recommendations
templates.content: We don't recommend a particular rack/hitch. However, there are some items you will want to keep in mind when looking at different options. First, you need to verify if the rack/hitch you're considering can support the bike's weight, and if you're going to carry multiple bikes, verify the rack's max weight capacity. The Z1 is 64 lbs. The S1 is 70 lbs with the battery installed. The ZX is 63 lbs with the battery installed. The S2 is 73 lbs with the battery installed. The R is 80 lbs with the battery installed. And the RX is 84 lbs with the battery installed. If selecting a Rack that secures the bike by the tires, make sure the rack can fit the width of the tires: S1 and Z1 have a tire width of 4.25 inches; ZX has a tire width of 4.5 inches; and R/RX and S2 have a tire width of 5.00 inches. We hope this helps with selecting the rack that is best for you. Please let me know if you have any other questions.

templates.name: Does Ristela have any estrogenic effects?
templates.content: Ristela contains no estrogen or hormones. It has been published that Ristela has an "absence of estrogen-like activities". (Stanislavov R and Rohdewald P. J Women's Health Care. 2014;3:1-6. An 8-week, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study conducted in 80 women ages 40-50.) The ingredients in Ristela are known to promote healthy blood flow and circulation, which are important factors in female sexual response to enhance sex drive and sexual satisfaction. It's recommended to speak with your healthcare provider if you have specific concerns.

templates.name: The inside of my MiiR has developed stains. How do I safely remove them?
templates.content:
Never use bleach or chlorine. Instead, we recommend one of the following:

- Use an all natural cleaning tablet like Bottle Bright
- Pour a solution of white distilled vinegar and warm water (1:5 ratio) into your MiiR and let soak for 10 minutes
- Create a paste with baking soda and warm water and gently scrub the paste directly onto stains with a soft bristled brush

templates.name: How to unclog the Needle
templates.content:
There are situations where the needle can get clogged with bits of cork or sediment. These directions should help! Unscrew the needle grip at the top of the needle to release the needle. The needle will drop down. Tilt it slightly and gently remove it from the Coravin System. Using your Coravin cleaning tool poke through the eye of the needle to remove any cork. Then slide the tool into the top of the needle and slide down. This action should push any excess cork towards the opening near the needle eye. Poke the tool through the eye of the needle again to remove any last cork particles. Remove the clip from the needle. Hold the cleaned needle by the needle grip, then tilt and slide it back into the needle guide. Securely screw the needle grip back into the Coravin.

This video may help as well: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xs2vaEFqYdY

templates.name: How do I care for my gold pieces?
templates.content: Our pieces are made to last forever, however all jewelry can naturally fade if mistreated. This fading can take months or years, depending on how you care for your jewelry. To decrease the chances of fading avoid chemicals, keep your piece in a ziploc bag or a Manssion pouch to keep oxygen at bay and pat dry after getting wet.

templates.name: What do you do with the trash you collect?
templates.content: Everything we collect is brought back to our facility where it's carefully sorted and weighed. What we can recycle gets recycled either by us for use in current and future products, or with local recycling partners in each community. At our South Florida location, everything we can't recycle is taken to Solid Waste Authority where it is turned into energy. In Hawaii, recyclable materials are brought to the local recycling center. Items that can't be recycled go to the H-Power plant, which is an energy-from-waste facility. At our Indonesia, Haiti, and Guatemala locations, we are storing what can't be recycled while evaluating our co-processing options in those locations.

templates.name: Are your other gemstones ethically sourced?

We work closely with our colored gemstone suppliers to improve standards and traceability, and we strive to promote higher standards for gemstone sourcing.

templates.name: What can you digitize? What can you not digitize?
templates.content: For tapes, we do digitize Betamax, VHS (VHS, S-VHS), VHS-C (VHS-C, S-VHS-C), 8mm (Video8, Hi8, Digital8, MP 120), MiniDV, MicroMV, & PAL or SECAM (all formats except for Betamax), and we don't digitize: BetaCam, BetaSP, U-Matic, Â¾" Tapes (commonly called VTR), DVCPro, DVCAM, DAT tapes, Broadcast tapes, anything larger than VHS. For film, we do digitize: 8mm, Super8, 16mm, Super16 up to 10.5" in diameter, and we don't digitize: 9.5mm, Super9.5, Film larger than 16mm, SOUND, reels of video tape, film cartridges and/or undeveloped film. For photos, we do digitize: 35mm color negatives, 35mm B&W negatives, 35mm slides, 126 Format Slides, and photo prints up to 8.5"x11", and we don't digitize: 127 Format Slides, undeveloped film, 120mm negatives, 110mm negatives, or any medium or large format negatives, 110 Format Slides, Kodak APS film/negatives (in or out of canister), disk negatives, stereo slides, 3D slides, 120mm slides, 110mm slides, or any medium or large format slides, prints larger than 8.5x11". For audio, we do digitize audio cassettes, micro cassettes, mini cassettes, reel-to-reel audio up to Â¼", and we don't digitize: vinyl, wire recording, 8 track tapes, reel-to-reel audio over Â¼. General things we don't digitize are floppy disks or anything already on a disc of any kind (disc negatives, mini DVDs, photo discs, etc), anything already in a digital format (memory cards, cell phone videos, etc)

templates.name: What is the difference between diffusing and air drying and how is it better?
templates.content: Diffusing speeds up drying time by gently, dispersing air evenly over a wider area of the hair and helps to prevent frizz and enhance your natural curls. Air drying allows the hair to dry on its own, which causes the hair to be wet for a longer period of time. When hair is wet, it swells, making it more fragile and more susceptible to breakage.

templates.name: Can I tie directly into my woodshop dust collection system or into an existing chimney, water heater exhaust, furnace exhaust, etc.?
templates.content: Do not tie in to existing vents or ducting. In some cases, this is a hazardous situation. Additionally, an ember could make it through the exhaust fan of the laser and ignite any dust or particulates settled in the existing duct line. It may also set off gasses from sewage vents, creosote from chimneys, and fuel pooling in exhaust systems., and more. Please ensure that all laser exhausts remain independent from other exhausts and dust collection systems.

templates.name: Is Nutrafol suitable for everyone?
templates.content:
Not only is Nutrafol suitable for most people, but our hair growth supplements are specifically formulated to meet you where you are in life. We have 5 Nutraceutical formulas that are tailored to the bio-specific needs of men and women throughout all life stages: Women's, Women's Vegan, Postpartum for the first year after childbirth or while breastfeeding, Women's Balance for peri- and postmenopause, and Men's.

Please note: We do not recommend Nutrafol to anyone under the age of 18. Also, while we have no reason to believe it's harmful, there have not been enough studies for us to say Nutrafol is suitable during pregnancy-so we recommend skipping it while pregnant or trying to conceive and sticking with Nutrafol Postpartum while breastfeeding. If you have a medical condition, or are taking medications (especially anticoagulant and blood-thinning drugs), please consult with your physician before taking Nutrafol.

templates.name: My device does not heat up like before, I don't feel it working
templates.content:
Please ensure full skin contact - The Precision Laser needs to be pressed flat against the skin to activate properly. Try using it on a smoother area, like your cheek or forehead, and make sure the tip is fully flush with the skin.

Fully charge the device - Even if it turns on, low battery can affect performance. Plug it in for at least 2-3 hours using a wall outlet (not a USB port).

Try a reset - Hold the power button for 10-15 seconds to reset the device, then try using it again at level 5.

Listen for the beep - You should hear a beep when a treatment pulse is successfully delivered. If you're not hearing that, it may not be activating correctly.

If you've tried all the above and are still experiencing the same issue, please let me know.

templates.name: What is the difference between Retinol and Bakuchiol?
templates.content: Retinol is a case by case basis depending on the frequency, type, and skin sensitivity. Unfortunately it causes long term damage to the skin when used regularly. templates.name: How do I care for the AireBrush Duo?
templates.content:

When not in use, your interchangeable hot air blow dry brush should be disconnected and stored in a safe, dry location, out of reach of children. Do not wrap the cord around the dryer. templates.name: How do you clean the autobrush after using?
templates.content: While our products are designed with grade V waterproofing, we recommend removing the brush head and cleaning it after each use. Make sure the brush head is thoroughly dry before replacing it back. You can also clean the body of the brush once a month. Always avoid submerging or rinsing the body in water but rather use a damp washcloth to remove any toothpaste residue or build-up. Pat it dry once youâ€™ve cleaned it off.

templates.name: How often do I need to replace the head?
templates.content: We recommend replacing your brush head every 2-3 months.

templates.name: How do I choose the brush size?
templates.content: You can choose a brush size based on age, or you can base it on the actual size of your mouth. To measure the size of your mouth, you can use dental floss and measure with a ruler. Here's a link to our comprehensive size chart: https://support.tryautobrush.com/article/kamruplhvk-how-to-find-the-right-brush-head-size

templates.name: Will it reach the back of my teeth?
templates.content: Yes! There are vertical bristles that brush all edges ofÂ your teeth.

templates.name: How long will my autobrush last?
templates.content: It depends on care and use! If you take care of it well, it can last for a long time. A fair timeframe would be around 2-3 years.

templates.name: Is the silicone food grade?
templates.content: Yes! Our brush heads are made from food-grade silicone material.

templates.name: Can your toothpaste be swallowed?
templates.content: Yes, itâ€™s safe to swallow, but donâ€™t do it intentionally. Itâ€™s fluoride-free, gluten-free, vegan, and non-GMO, so it doesn't have the ingredients which make a toothpaste harmful when swallowed. If you or your kid happen to swallow it by accident, it's completely safe.

templates.name: How long should I brush for using the AutoBrush?
templates.content: Our product has beenÂ professionallyÂ tested to properly clean all surface spots in just 30 seconds - so one click, and youâ€™re set for 30 seconds. You can run for an additional cycle for a deeper clean.

templates.name: Can I use regular toothpaste?
templates.content: Yes, you can, although we recommend using our foam toothpaste since it has lower viscosity as compared to your regular toothpaste. This means that our foaming toothpaste easily breaks down during the 30-second cycle of your AutoBrush, making it very effective in providing deeper cleaning action.

templates.name: How many shades whiter can I expect my teeth to get?
templates.content: It varies from person to person, so we canâ€™t guarantee that, but generally,Â it may lighten anywhere from 6 to 12 shades on the whitening shade guide, depending on how discolored the teeth were originally.

templates.name: Can I still drink coffee or wine after using the whitening pen?
templates.content: Yes, you can! But we recommend drinking water afterwards to rinse your mouth, to avoid staining.

templates.name: What if my child is just under 3 years old? Can he/she still use it?
templates.content: Our products are great for ages 3 and up. In general, 3 is the min age for AutoBrush but we've seen successes from parents that use it for their toddlers aged 2 and up. Check this link out for more info: https://support.tryautobrush.com/article/0jxmjxyiaz-can-kids-below-3-years-old-use-auto-brush

templates.name: What is an ICCID number?
templates.content: ICCID (Integrated Circuit Card Identifier) is a 20-digit number on the SIM card. Every SIM card, regardless of cellular carrier, has the ICCID printed on the card body, as well as on the SIM itself. During the activation process, you will need the ICCID number from that SIM card.

templates.name: What do I do when slime is hard or stiff?
templates.content: This happens to slime when it's used a lot or not placed in an airtight container. You can fix it by adding a little bit of lotion or glycerin to your slime, which will soften it back up. You can also try running slime under very hot water (adults, please supervise children if you do this). Heat breaks the molecules back down so it becomes more like slime again.

templates.name: What is CEFALY?
templates.content: CEFALY is the first FDA-cleared device of its kind for the treatment of migraine headaches. It is a non-invasive, drug-free approach to help relieve migraine pain and decrease the number of migraine days. In technical terms, it is an external trigeminal nerve stimulator, which is a non-invasive device on the head to stimulate and desensitize the trigeminal nerve.

templates.name: What is the difference between farm-raised and wild seafood?
templates.content: Farmed seafood - like most meat - comes from species raised in a controlled enclosure, specifically for the purpose of eating them. Because 80-85% of wild-caught species suffer from overfishing, sustainably aqua-farmed seafood often makes for a more sustainable option than wild-caught seafood. We vet all our aqua-farmed species to ensure humane management, no impact to the natural environment, and reduction of wild species as a source of feed. Additionally, all of our wild caught species are from fisheries that have been specifically managed to ensure the sustainability of the species.

templates.name: How do I place an order for In-Store Pickup?

Find your closest store location by typing in your ZIP code or postal code, select your store location and click on "Pick up in-store". 

Generally, orders placed by 2 p.m. (local time) will be ready for pickup on the same day that you place your order. Orders placed after 2 p.m. (local time) will be ready by the time the store opens the next day. You will receive an order confirmation email that the order has been placed and a second email once the order is ready. Please wait until you receive the Ready for Pickup email before going to the store to pick up the order.

templates.name: My order was not processed and there is a charge on my account. When will the charge be removed?
templates.content:
If you used a credit card or debit card the charge you see is actually a pre-authorization hold. This is a temporary electronic authorization. The card will not be charged unless the order ships. If you did not complete the order, the authorization will drop off your account according to your credit card or bank policy. This generally happens within 2 - 10 business days. For more information, contact your credit card company or bank to find out when the authorization will be released.

If you used PayPal, the charge you see is actually a pre-transaction notification. This notification will drop off your PayPal account within 30 days. Contact PayPal directly to find out exactly when the pending notification will drop off.

templates.name: How do I care for my Mattress Protector?

templates.name: What's the difference between BDGR and GRZLY tires?
templates.content: The BDGR tire is a natural urban explorer. Built to take on the concrete jungle, with a modernized big block tread design, this tire is ready to dodge and weave through back alleys, green belts, and traffic-laden streets to deliver you to your final destination with confidence and style. On the other hand, the GRZLY offers a tread for those seeking to venture beyond the paved path. With an aggressive knobby tread pattern, the GRZLY offers excellent grip on a variety of terrain, designed to dig into loose dirt and gravel with ferocity or provide consistent contact and grip on hardpack, rock, and asphalt. Also worth noting that riding the GRZLY on paved roads, the biggest difference will be how loud the tires are compared to the BDGR since the GRZLY is designed to grip loose dirt, just like off road tires are louder than street tires on a vehicle.

templates.name: I have leftover color. Can I save it for touchups?
templates.content: I'm afraid you cannot save leftover hair color for two reasons. When you mix IGK Activate and IGK Color Pigment, the formula begins to oxidize, creating color energy in the bottle. This energy, if stored, can cause the bottle to expand and can create an unintentional (and very colorful) mess. Also, pre-oxidized color cannot be saved and reused as it will not fully color your hair, which may lead to an undesirable result.

templates.name: What is the difference between a footbed and an insole/orthotic?
templates.content:
Regular footbeds are designed to provide a cushioning effect and absorb shock. They may feel comfortable at first, but they do not address the biomechanical cause of excess pronation.

Insoles provide some degree of shock absorption, but more importantly they are functional and are designed to help you reclaim your footprint by supporting natural alignment from the ground up. Some footbeds also feature an arch support; however, quality insoles such as Orthaheel do a lot more than just support the arches.

For additional information about our insoles, please visit our Insoles Guide here: https://www.vionicshoes.com/orthotics-guide

templates.name: How do I prepare pu-erh tea?
templates.content:
While we recommend particular times, temperatures, and serving sizes, this is really up to your preference and tastes. Pu-erh teas are post-fermented green or black teas that have been aged, sort of like fine wine. 

You can do an "awakening" of the tea leaves by using 8 ounces of water at 206 F and rinsing them, then immediately drain them. Then you can steep as per the instructions below.

For most pu-erh teas, we recommend one tablespoon unless indicated otherwise in the directions, a water temperature of 206 F, and let the tea leaves steep for 3-5 minutes.

templates.name: My succulent is turning reddish
templates.content:
Succulents come in a wide range of colors, and the same plant can even look different at different times of the year. Seasonal color patterns vary greatly, but many varieties show red hues in winter or summer.

Red tones can also be a sign that a succulent is "beautifully stressed". The stress could be from sun exposure, a water shortage, or cold temperatures. Succulents are well-adapted to tolerate sun, drought, and a range of temperatures, so stress coloration does not mean a plant has been damaged, just that it's nearing the limits of its tolerance. Normal colors will return when the stress diminishes.

templates.name: Should I use the liquid concentrated dyes or the dye blocks?
templates.content: There are benefits to both types of dye, but your choice will ultimately depend on your personal preference. Because the liquid dyes come with a dropper, they're extremely easy to measure and blend very quickly with the wax. You simply count the number of drops you use per pound, and make note of the amount, this ensures you get a consistent color with every batch you make. The dye blocks are also very easy to use. Depending on the size batch you're making, you may add one full block or a partial block to achieve the desired color. With each type, you're able to vary the shade by using more or less dye, or you can also blend different dyes to create unique or unusual colors.

templates.name: Can I use a box spring instead of a foundation?
templates.content:
You can place your Big Fig Mattress on top of any bed, box spring, or another surface that you choose. But in order to maintain the comfort and integrity of your mattress, especially for bigger figure sleepers, it must be able to evenly and properly support the weight of the mattress and the sleepers on top.

Unfortunately, we don't know of any box spring on the market that can pass the test. If you're able to find a box spring or foundation that is guaranteed to support at least 1,220 lbs. (the weight of a Big Fig Mattress + two sleepers weighing a total of 1,100 lbs.), you can use it under a Big Fig Mattress.

templates.name: Can you tell me about Bonafide, what is your brand about?
templates.content:
We started Bonafide with a simple mission in mind: to provide women with naturally powerful solutions for perfectly natural symptoms. templates.name: Can I use them if I am breastfeeding or pregnant?
templates.content: Due to the pearls being inserted into your body, we don't recommend using a detox. The herbs within our products are absorbed into your body and will come through your breastmilk or could affect your pregnancy. We ask women not to detox during pregnancy as each woman's body reacts differently when pregnant. What could be perfectly fine for one pregnancy could cause complications in another. It's best to let your body do what it naturally does whilst pregnant.

templates.name: System: Stuck / fallen off clamps
templates.content:
We're sorry to hear you're having an issue with your Clamps. Not to worry, as the SmartClamps piece can be reattached back to your system without issues! Please follow these instructions:

1. Clamp may come off if the friction stop gets stuck in the clamp body due to sticky wine
- Rince in water prevents this.
2. For re-assembly:
- Remove the needle. Rinse the clamp in water to loosen up the parts.
- Hold the Clamp in one hand with thumb pushing the release button UP
- Hold the rest of the device in the other hand
- Bring the clamp and device together to slide the clamp onto the cross shaped rail on the device (keep the release button UP while doing this)
- Clamp should slide on - then release the button and it should lock on place.

Please let me know if you have any difficulties with reattaching your clamps.

templates.name: How do I know which to choose between the mechanical and hydraulic brakes?

templates.name: Is the sugar in OLLY gummies counterproductive to health?
templates.content: We believe the health benefits that go along with enriching the diet in essential nutrients far outweigh the slight disadvantage of delivering them with sugar. Importantly, the amount of sugar in a serving of OLLY gummies (2 to 4 grams) represents a fraction of the average total daily sugar intake by most Americans (80 grams). It's roughly equivalent to eating about 5-10 raisins or drinking an eighth of a cup of apple juice. The real advantage of gummies is that people actually enjoy taking them - so they do. If supplements don't get eaten because the experience is unpleasant, then they're not very effective supplements. We chose not to use artificial "sugar-free" sweeteners because they have been linked to health issues and we wanted to stick with only natural sweeteners, colors and flavors.

templates.name: What if you donâ€™t love it?
templates.content:
You know you have 180-nights to test your Siena out. This starts from the day you receive your new mattress.

Most people love their Siena from night one. But if you're not immediately in love, we recommend giving it at least 30 days before making a final decision. This is to give you time to adjust to the new mattress - especially important if this is your first memory foam, or you're upgrading from a tired old mattress.

If after 30 days, and before the 180th day, you decide that it's not right for you, just get in touch with our customer support team and we'll start the return process.

templates.name: My succulent is fading to green or white
templates.content: Fading and greening can be signs that a succulent is not getting enough light. If a succulent is not getting enough light, it will also usually stretch at the stem as it tries to reach more sunlight. If a succulent has been kept in too little light for a long time, you can improve its coloration by moving it outdoors (weather permitting), keeping it closer to a sunny window, or using a dedicated grow light on it. Stretching will not reverse, but you can prune and repot succulents to get them back into a tidy, compact form.

templates.name: Differences between your 3 mattresses? (Essential, Original, and Waterproof Crib Mattress)
templates.content:
Our crib mattresses come in three versions. Our patented Wovenaire core is in all of our mattresses and it's made up of 90% air by volume and 10% food-grade polymer, Wovenaire is, well, just that - woven-air. The difference in the mattresses comes down to what type of cover is best for your family. The 3 mattress options are the Essential, Original, and Waterproof Crib Mattress. 

The Essential is a slimmer profile at only 4" thick instead of 5.5" that you find in the Original and Waterproof versions. The covers vary in each type of mattress, so the Essential one has a thinner single layer of spacer material that covers the Wovenaire core, the Original, however, is made with 2-layers of thick spacer material that is quilted together to create soft pillows of air over the fully breathable Wovenaire core, and our Waterproof Mattress uses the same construction in the cover as our Original one, plus a layer of breathable waterproof lining added to one side of the cover. This toddler side helps combat bigger messes as your baby grows and potty training begins! Each mattress cover fully zips off, and the entire mattress is washable from cover to the core. The Essential is a bit firmer in feel, as the cover isn't as thick or quilted as the other 2 which are 2-stage mattresses: firm enough for babies, and comfortable to grow with them all through toddler years.

templates.name: Can MINDBODYSKIN be taken with vitex?
templates.content:
Our supplement contains DIM which works in conjunction with chasteberry (vitex) extract to resolve the dominance of estrogen over progesterone. We of course always recommend consulting a medical professional.
Additionally, a blend of Vitex/DIM/Vitamin B6 which are proven to support female hormonal health and estrogen balance.

DIM is a natural compound that comes from cruciferous vegetables, and has been shown to help support healthy estrogen balance- which in turn helps symptoms from PMS, acne, fibroids, etc. Vitex comes from Chaste Berry and is an herb commonly used to treat PMS symptoms and irregular periods.

templates.name: How do I set the Litter-Robot 4 timer (Wait Time Setting)?
templates.content: Press and hold the Empty button on the Litter-Robot control panel for 3 seconds to enter Wait Time Setting mode. The light bar will indicate the current Wait Time setting. Subsequent short presses of the Empty button will toggle through the following settings: 3 minutes = 1 green light displayed; 7 minutes = 2 green lights displayed; 15 minutes = 3 green lights displayed; 25 minutes = 4 green lights displayed; 30 minutes = 5 (all) green lights displayed. After selecting the preferred setting, a 3-second long press of the Empty button will save the setting.

templates.name: If I have my own scanner, what setting should I use?
templates.content: Depending on how large the print is and how large you want to go you should scan from 800 to 2400 dpi. Be sure to crop to just the image area so that the scanner surface is not included. Some scanners include software to remove dust and scratches automatically. If you still see a lot of imperfections and spots on the digital file, you can add Minor Retouching to the order and we will remove that.

templates.name: What should I eat when the diet ends?
templates.content: On Day 6, after the diet ends, you should avoid binge eating and resume your normal diet gradually. You should start with liquid food, such as soups and fruit juices, followed by light meals, including rice, pasta, and small portions of meat, fish and/or legumes. A normal diet can be resumed on day 7, or 24 hours after the end of the ProLon diet.

templates.name: Where does the name M.Gemi come from?
templates.content: Our name is inspired by our co-founder, Maria Gangemi, a devotee to the art of fine Italian shoemaking and the artisans who practice it. Growing up in Sicily, Maria would stop by the nearby shops every week to see what new shoes the local artisans had made by hand, just a few pairs at a time, with stunning attention to detail. That's where her passion for Italian craftsmanship began and where our story begins.

templates.name: Why am I having difficulty removing my blade after blending?
templates.content: Blending creates pressure inside the cup to break down ingredients. Make sure not to fill past the max line. The longer your blend cycle is on, the longer pressure builds inside the cup. An alternative is blending multiple times in shorter cycles.

templates.name: Are the fragrances hypoallergenic?
templates.content: This term means "less allergenic". If a fragrance contains natural essential oils, allergens will be present. A "hypoallergenic" fragrance is almost completely made of synthetic ingredients. It is the FDA's position that there is no such thing as a "non-allergenic" cosmetic - that is, a cosmetic that can be guaranteed never to produce an allergic reaction.

templates.name: Can I adjust the handlebars ( Level, Level.2, Pace 350, Pace 350.2, Soltera)
templates.content: Yes, you can! To adjust the angle of your handlebars, first loosen the 4 fixing bolts near the stem of the handlebar. They're located behind the display in an X-pattern. Then, simply rotate the handlebar fore (upward) or aft (downward) to your desired position. But please know that this adjustment doesn't raise the handlebar, it merely positions it at an upward or downward angle. Re-tighten the 4 bolts and you'll lock your new position in place!
